review: I'm having issues with connectivity...recently upgraded to faster internet and it still lags a big.  some apps do not work.  Netflix app takes a while to load...works faster on my xbox 360.
author: Luana N. Obregon

review: I enjoy amazon prime content viewed on my TV.  The only complaint I have is picture goes to screensaver while the sound continues.  It's no big deal If the remote is nearby.  I suspect it's something I'm doing.
author: edward sebanc

review: great compact size and works perfectly
author: HokiePride78

review: Apparently my TV though it has an HDMI does not support the stick..  Wouldnt work.  Returned it.  The TV is a Toshiba LCD about 5 years old.  Disappointing.
author: J Troyer

review: still having to figure it all out, but it is working well for my needs at this time
author: Tina Jackson

review: Picked this up when Amazon offered it to Prime members for $19.99. Works better for streaming Amazon movies than my Blueray player.
author: Invisigoth

review: Excellent product, works better than I expected; originally thought it was like Chromecast but certain things are better, but not others. I've been using since December and
author: David Ruiz
